tumble.gui

Class DrawingSurface

  • java.lang.Object
    • processing.core.PApplet
      • tumble.gui.DrawingSurface
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    processing.core.PConstants, KeyHandler, ScreenSwitcher

    public class DrawingSurface
extends processing.core.PApplet
implements ScreenSwitcher, KeyHandler
    Represents a canvas onto which a game is drawn. Credit to Mr. Shelby for basic class structure.
    Version:
    May 5, 2020
    Author:
    Amanda Xu, Andra Liu, Julia Gu
